channel.title: Status-Update on THE ANDORI DATABASE
channel.description: Recent content in Status-Update on THE ANDORI DATABASE

item.title: Update regarding the research of 'A-51 Shomeret'
item.description:
‘Shomeret’

Once, in a deep, deep slumber, a guardian stands tall. A guardian who protects all it deems worth protection. You are not one of them. You can never be one of them.

Its a simple set of rules, an order only broken twice.

Why did you do this? You fool.
item.content:
‘Shomeret’

Once, in a deep, deep slumber, a guardian stands tall. A guardian who protects all it deems worth protection. You are not one of them. You can never be one of them.

Its a simple set of rules, an order only broken twice.

Why did you do this? You fool.
